title: Bulova Diamonds: Style & Design
description: A diamond destination since 1875, Bulova embodies the beauty of classic style and modern design.

asset.author: Bulova Watches
asset.description: A diamond destination since 1875, Bulova embodies the beauty of classic style and modern design.

transcripts: In it's 140 year history in Bulova has always strive to be a diamond destination if you look at Bulova's history you can find diamond style as far back as the nineteen-thirties this is a completely new design that's meant to be versatile and that's meant to take the wearer from day-to-night. The chronograph version features extra elements on the dial for a sporty feel, but we brought back some of the softness and some of the elegance by using a diamond set mother of pearl dial. The current thing we observed in apparel and accessories was for muted neutrals and we wanted to offer you a watch that you could easily pair with your existing pieces so we brought in touches of rose gold to add a bit of warmth and elegance. One of the values that we stand behind this craftsmanship which is something that is reflected in the fluidity of the bracelets. With the Bulova diamond collection we wanted to offer you a watch that is classic, chic, and versatile.
